author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN'S OUTER RAINBANDS PRODUCING GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAINS ACROSS THE VIRGIN ISLANDS AND PUERTO RICO...
summary: ...ERIN'S OUTER RAINBANDS PRODUCING GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAINS ACROSS THE VIRGIN ISLANDS AND PUERTO RICO... As of 2:00 AM AST Sun Aug 17 the center of Erin was located near 20.4, -66.1 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 940 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
